NOI 2025

The Nordic Olympiad in Informatics 2025 was held on the 5th of March by Denmark. Results are available here.

The three selected tasks were Dodgeball Diplomacy, Garbage Collection and Xoracle.

Statements

  • Dodgeball Diplomacy
  • Garbage Collection
  • Xoracle

Solutions

  • Dodgeball Diplomacy
  • Garbage Collection
  • Xoracle

Test Data

  • Dodgeball Diplomacy
  • Garbage Collection
  • Xoracle

NOI 2024

The Nordic Olympiad in Informatics 2024 was held on the 6th of March by Finland. Results are available here.

The three selected tasks were Anime Shops, Chair Game and Thin Ice.

NOI 2023

The Nordic Olympiad in Informatics 2023 was held on the 22nd of March by Iceland. Results are available here.

The three selected tasks were ChatNOI (from Iceland), Ice Cream Machines (from Iceland) and Island Alliances (from Sweden).

  • Ice Cream Machines (English)
  • Island Alliances (English)

NOI 2017

The Nordic Olympiad in Informatics 2017 was held on the 8th of March by Sweden. Results are available here.

The three selected tasks were Subway (from Sweden), Yule Lads (from Iceland), and IP over Avian Carrier (from Finland).

  • Yule Lads (English)
